text: Arnex railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Arnex- sur-Orbe, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Simplon line of Swiss Federal Railways and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Arnex: * RER Vaud: ** : hourly service between and ; one daily round-trip continues from Villeneuve to . ** : rush-hour service between and via Vallorbe. == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Vaud Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations
title: Arnex railway station
